n = # some ridiculously large number, omitted
N = [int(i) for i in str(n)]
maxProduct = 0
for i in range(0,len(N)-4):
    newProduct = 1
    is_cons = 0
    for j in range(i,i+4):
        if N[j] == N[j+1] - 1:
        is_cons += 1
    if is_cons == 5:
        for j in range(i,i+5):
            newProduct *= N[j]
        if newProduct > maxProduct:
            maxProduct = newProduct
print maxProduct
